TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SystemParameter extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies the system parameter type.

span.span: Specifies the system parameter type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il enumerazione viene utilizzato principalmente dal metodo.The enumeration is primarily used by the method. Recupera se un Ã¨ supportato nella versione corrente del sistema operativo. retrieves whether a is supported on the current version of the operating system. Per ulteriori informazioni sui parametri a livello di sistema, vedere "SystemParametersInfo" nella documentazione di Platform SDK [ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com).For more information about system-wide parameters, see "SystemParametersInfo" in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.SystemParameter CaretWidthMetric = int32(8)
CaretWidthMetric = 8

summary.span: Identifies the caret width, in pixels, for edit controls.

span.span: Identifies the caret width, in pixels, for edit controls.

summary.span: Use the property to access this system-wide parameter.

span.span: Use the property to access this system-wide parameter.

summary.span: The corresponding Platform SDK system-wide parameters are SPI_GETCARETWIDTH and SPI_SETCARETWIDTH.

span.span: The corresponding Platform SDK system-wide parameters are SPI_GETCARETWIDTH and SPI_SETCARETWIDTH.
